data.name: Overdose WW2
data.detailed_description:
What is Overdose WW2

Overdose WW2 is a story set in an alternate timeline.

Game Modes

The game comes with a single-player story mode at launch. After the game release, there will be Zombie mode and additional content to continue the Story. Additional story missions will include a plot independent of the main game.

1944 One of the paratroopers, who attacked towards Berlin, lands in a region far from his unit. Trying to reach his goal by exiting the difficult enemy zone, Er.Miles captures a few important plans of the enemy.
Try to deliver the information you have to the closest allied unit among the enemies on this difficult road that you set out on your own.
data.about_the_game:
What is Overdose WW2

Overdose WW2 is a story set in an alternate timeline.

Game Modes

The game comes with a single-player story mode at launch. After the game release, there will be Zombie mode and additional content to continue the Story. Additional story missions will include a plot independent of the main game.

1944 One of the paratroopers, who attacked towards Berlin, lands in a region far from his unit. Trying to reach his goal by exiting the difficult enemy zone, Er.Miles captures a few important plans of the enemy.
Try to deliver the information you have to the closest allied unit among the enemies on this difficult road that you set out on your own.
data.short_description: Overdose WW2 is an FPS game set in the Second World War. It is a game that aims to offer an experience like 90s FPS games. Overdose comes with content that aims to offer you a long gameplay and nostalgia. The game is an FPS game set in the second world war.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo E6550 / AMD 64 x2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD 3450 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9
  • Additional Notes: DirectPlay is required for Windows7/ 10 users.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Quad / AMD Phenom II X4 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD 5570 / GT 430 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9
  • Additional Notes: DirectPlay is required for Windows 7/10 users.
